entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
